string.text: Captive: find out what happened
We've escaped the anomaly, but I don't know what happened afterwards. Why am I in captivity? I need to figure out what's going on.
Captive: speak to the captives
Savage didn't explain anything, but he's told me he'll help. It might be worth having a word with one of the other captives in the cell. Maybe they know what I'm doing here.
Captive: go to sleep
Things are bad, I still have no clue how to get out of here. I should wait until morning. By then, Savage might have the chance to speak to this Saurel. The best way I can kill time is to sleep.
Captive: wait for Savage to finish his plans
Time to rise and shine. Still have to wait until I get an answer. Savage should manage to find a way to get me out of here.
Captive: speak to the guard
A guard says that he wants to speak with me.
Captive: speak to Saurel
The guard has told me that Saurel, the head of the base, wants to see me.
Two friends: find and kill Lefty

Saurel is the head of the stalkers at the Stronghold. He says that they had an emergency yesterday. A few stalkers got wasted, and things didn't end up well, leading to a fist fight. The morning after, one of these stalkers was found with his throat cut, and another stalker, Lefty, went missing somewhere. There's something shady going on here, and I need to figure it out. There's no need to get to the bottom of it, though, since it looks like Lefty cut up his wrongdoer and then realized what he's gotten himself into before hightailing it out of there. I need to find and punish him.
Two friends: speak to Rasputin
The local barman, by the name of Rasputin, has asked me to go see him to talk about something.
Two friends: find Lefty
Rasputin says that Lame couldn't have been killed by Lefty. Once I get the chance to see this Lefty, I should talk to him personally. Maybe he can shed a different light on the event.
Two friends: speak to Lefty
I've found Lefty. Time to have a chat with him.
Two friends: tell Saurel about your findings

Lefty tells me that he and Lame gathered a lot of artifacts not long ago and hid them in a container, later on having a drink with a couple of stalkers. Afterward, Lefty found out that Lame brought the artifact container with him to the base, and because of that, there was fighting. Lefty decided to leave, and after a while, Rasputin messaged him that Lame was killed by the other stalkers and that the container was stolen. His side of the story seems trustworthy; I should share it with Saurel.
Two friends: return to Lefty
Saurel is allowing Lefty to return. I should give the news to him.
Two friends: investigate the murder
Lefty's dead, and this definitely hasn't been done by any bandits. Whoever's responsible is likely covering their tracks. I need to search for clues here. Maybe I'll find something.
Two friends: speak to Saurel
I've found a knife at the murder scene. I should go to Saurel and tell him about the recent events.
Two friends: speak to Rasputin about the knife
Rasputin is the barman here. He should know everything about what happens in the base. Perhaps he may know the owner of the knife.
Two friends: return to the murder scene

Rasputin has told me that the knife I'm carrying belongs to Chemist. He's also told me that Chemist remembers where he lost his knife and has gone off to look for it. I need to return to the area where Lefty was killed and confirm whether this Chemist is there or not.
Two friends: kill Chemist
It turns out that Chemist was the killer. He killed both Lame and Lefty, and now it's time for me to avenge them.
Two friends: search Chemist's corpse
Chemist is dead. I should check out his possessions. Perhaps there's something that can verify that he really is the killer of both Lame and Lefty.
Two friends: look for information in Chemist's PDA
Chemist's backpack held a PDA. I should check out his latest entries.
Two friends: tell everything to Saurel
Chemist was definitely the one who killed Lame and Lefty. Time to share all the details with Saurel.
Active reconnaissance: speak to Saurel
Shaman has told me that Saurel's asked me to go see him. I wonder what he wants.
Active reconnaissance: remain at the sniper position
My task is to help the guys from a sniper position. I just have to wait for the bandits.
Active reconnaissance: kill the bandits
The bandits are already on the move near the northern farm. They have to be stopped.
Active reconnaissance: speak to Marchuk
We've taken out the bandits. I may want to speak to the detachment leader who helped me repel the attack.
Active reconnaissance: check the bandits' hidden channel
I need to make sure that the bandits aren't planning anything else, and for that, I need to listen in on their comms.
Active reconnaissance: return to the sniper position
The bandits have sent yet another group, this time to the Panskiy farm. I need to return to the sniper position and put them down.
Active reconnaissance: repel the second bandit attack
The bandits are here. Time to tango.
Active reconnaissance: return to Saurel
We've taken out the bandit reinforcements and resisted the bandit attacks. I should return to Saurel and inform him about our success… and also get my reward.
Rest in peace: kill the zombies in the cemetery
Skew, a drunkard on the northern farm, has asked me to rid the nearby cemetery of zombified stalkers.
Rest in peace: return to Skew
The zombies are dead… for good. I can now return to Skew.
Meet with Miklukha
Miklukha, the leader of Freedom at the Outpost, has asked me to see him.
Call of the Monolith: gather stalkers to disrupt the Monolith meeting

Miklukha has told me that a meeting between high-ranking members of the Monolith is taking place at the factory in the near future. There won't be many guards at the meeting; a good opportunity to take out their leader. Miklukha's also asked me to find a few people as backup.
Call of the Monolith: return to Miklukha
Miklukha has sent me a message and has told me it's time to finish preparations. The Monolith meeting is taking place soon. I should see him and discuss our plans.
Call of the Monolith: speak to Miklukha
We're almost at the factory. I should talk to Miklukha again.
Call of the Monolith: follow Miklukha
I need to follow Miklukha.
Call of the Monolith: speak to Miklukha
We've arrived. I should have a talk with Miklukha.
Call of the Monolith: ask the stalkers for help

The meeting turned out to be fake; an ambush was waiting for us at the factory. Miklukha and the others have covered me and have allowed me to slip out of the Monolith's hands, but we need to get back to base and ask Saurel to send reinforcements.
Call of the Monolith: return to the factory
Saurel has refused to send reinforcements to the factory, so it's up to me to save Miklukha and the others.
Call of the Monolith: search Miklukha's corpse
Miklukha and his group are dead. I wasn't able to save them. I need to see what Miklukha has in his backpack. Maybe I'll find something useful.
Call of the Monolith: find a way to access Miklukha's PDA
I've retrieved Miklukha's PDA from his backpack, but it's encrypted. I need to find someone who can help me unlock it.
Shadows of the past: get to the space bubble at the factory

Petrovich has asked me to send the coordinates of the bubble exit to the stalkers who have gotten stuck inside. He tells me it's better if I send the coordinates myself while I'm close to the anomaly.
Shadows of the past: send the exit coordinates
I'm near the anomaly. Now I can try sending the coordinates.
Shadows of the past: wait for an answer from the stalkers
The coordinates have been sent. I need to see if the stalkers inside have received them.
Shadows of the past: speak to Fish
I know these stalkers well. I should speak with them.
Shadows of the past: find out what happened from the stalker
I woke up on the farm. I can't remember anything after taking a rifle butt to the head. I need to ask this stalker about what happened.
Shadows of the past: speak to Petrovich
I've most likely set Stronglav free. It'll be best not to tell any of the stalkers about this. In any case, I need to speak to Petrovich.
Shadows of the past: speak to Saurel
Petrovich has told me to see Saurel to find out what's inside Miklukha's PDA.
Exchange: find an SR-3 Vikhr
The trader who can offer us two Monolith suits requires an SR-3 Vikhr rifle in return. I need to try to find one.
Exchange: give the SR-3 Vikhr to Saurel
I have an SR-3 Vikhr that I should hand it over to Saurel.
Easy prey: acquire 6 blind dog tails
I need to get a hold of six blind dog tails for the hunters at the caravan.
Easy prey: give the tails to the hunter
I have all the tails. Now time to go turn them in.
In the dead of night: wait until night

Ratter has told me that he can find an SR-3 Vikhr rifle for me in exchange for helping him escape. I don't think there's any other way of getting that rifle. I need to help him by stealing the cage key, but first, I need to wait until Sologub goes to sleep.
In the dead of night: steal the key from the nightstand
Sologlub should be asleep by now. The key's on the nightstand.
In the dead of night: return to Ratter
I have the key. I can now return to Ratter.
In the dead of night: give the key to Ratter
I need to give the key to Ratter..
In the dead of night: go to the meeting place
Ratter now has the key. I need to wait for him by the house while he escapes along with another bandit.
In the dead of night: wait for Ratter
Now I just have to wait for Ratter at the meeting place.
In the dead of night: speak to Ratter
I should speak to Ratter.
In the dead of night: return the key back to its place
Ratter has successfully escaped and has told me that I can get the rifle in the morning. Until then, I should return the key.
In the dead of night: return to Saurel
Ratter has successfully escaped and has told me that I can get the rifle in the morning. I should now speak to Saurel.
Free time: speak to Rasputin about work

Saurel has told me that I can't leave the Stronghold right now. Only a guide can lead me out of the area, but he's not at the Stronghold right now. While I wait for him, I might as well do some work, which I should speak to Rasputin about.
Anomalous grove: find the Kolobok artifact for Rasputin
Rasputin has told me that there's a Kolobok artifact in the anomalous grove, or rather, at the top of it. He's asked me to retrieve and return it.
Anomalous grove: give the Kolobok to Rasputin
I have the artifact. I can now return to Rasputin.
Anomalous grove: tell Rasputin about recent events
Outside the anomalous grove, a group of bandits surrounded me and stole the Kolobok artifact. I need to inform Rasputin about this.
A tooth for a tooth: retrieve the weapons from Ratter
Crooked has messaged me and says that Ratter is ready to give me my reward for setting him free in the form of two SR-3 Vikhr rifles.
Masquerade: wait for the package with the outfits
I've given an SR-3 Vikhr to Saurel. Now I have to wait for the delivery with the outfits.
Masquerade: speak to Saurel
Saurel has informed me that the outfit delivery has arrived. I should go see him.
Masquerade: reconfigure the PDA with Petrovich's help
I have the outfit and the explosives. The last part of the disguise will be a reconfigured PDA so that Monolith will recognize me as one of their own.
Masquerade: speak to Savage
Petrovich has reconfigured my PDA. Now I can speak to Savage and be on my way.
Masquerade: follow Savage
I need to follow Savage to the Monolith base.
Masquerade: speak to Werewolf
The leader of the Monolith group has sent me a message and asked me to see him. Let's hope they don't see through us.
Masquerade: plant the explosives on the second floor
We've arrived at the base. It's time to plant the explosives.
Masquerade: put on the Monolith suit
Saurel has given me the Monolith suit. I should put it on.
Interesting proposal: speak to Rasputin
Rasputin has messaged me and says that he has something to talk about. I wonder what he needs this time?…
Interesting proposal: speak to Hunter
Rasputin has told me about a stalker who's gone to the farm. His name is Hunter, and he needs help. I should speak to him.
Pseudoflesh: find the pseudoflesh
I need to find the pseudoflesh.
Pseudoflesh: follow Hunter
Hunter has asked me to help him hunt down the pseudoflesh.
Pseudoflesh: wait for Hunter's orders
We've arrived at the garbage. I should wait for directions from Hunter.
Pseudoflesh: speak to Hunter
It seems Hunter hasn't found anyone. I should speak to him about it.
Pseudoflesh: follow Hunter
Hunter suggests that the pseudoflesh might be hiding in another part of the garbage. I need to check it out.
Pseudoflesh: kill the pseudoflesh
We've found the pseudoflesh. Time to end it.
Pseudoflesh: speak to Hunter
The pseudoflesh is dead. I should now speak to Hunter.
The right to choose: descend into the laboratory or speak to Saurel
Savage might be in danger. I need to help him. But I might want to speak to Saurel first.
The right to choose: descend into the laboratory
I've spoken to Saurel. Now I can head into the laboratory to save Savage from the hands of the Monolith.
The right to choose: reconfigure the PDA with Petrovich
It seems I don't need to head into the laboratory after all, and in any case, I can't save Savage. I should see Hunter later to get out of the Stronghold, but first I should go talk to Petrovich.
The right to choose: speak to Hunter
I've decided not to rescue Savage; it's suicide. Saurel has told me that Hunter is ready to escort me out of the Stronghold. I should see him about that.
Collector: find a collection of mutant figurines for Petrovich

Petrovich has asked me to help him gather a collection of figurines of all mutants in the Zone. He already has a bloodsucker figurine. I need to find figurines of the following mutants: blind dog, pseudodog, boar, flesh, burer, controller, chimera, snork, and pseudogiant.
